Message:
The heated gaze of the audience,
eagerly waiting for
the opening act.

Ah, it sure has been
a while since I’ve felt it.

But today,
it’s the birth of
a brand new me.
Hehe! Because...

“Great Cordie—
I mean, Ringmaster!
We’re all hitched up
and ready to roll!”

Turning around,
I saw Flack and
the rest of our troupemates
waiting for my signal.

Everyone worked really hard
for this day, didn’t they?

“Alright, let’s get
this show on the road!
Curtains up for
the Fran Circus Troupe’s
first show!”
